title: Ayio Gala
description: Site in the northwestern corner of the island of Chios consisting of a two caves, both containing pottery and other remains dated to the Neolithic period. The entrance to the upper cave is located inside the Panayia Galactonosera chapel.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Ayio Gala cave site, derived from an an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of Σπήλαιο Αγιου Γάλακτος
